con:testCase.name: TC68677
con:testCase.con:description:
Test Case Name: Restructure on AF with account in arrears
Description: Do a restructure on a AF account that is in arrears.
Expected Result: Customer has other loans in arrears error message must be displayed, on the Access Facility details screen Y indicator must be displayed next to Suspensive condition and Access facility in arrears.
